response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a remarkable opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $10,000, at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
